title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Kenya 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has stayed the same over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019, and lastly roughly constant from 2019 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 6.32 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 4.86 was reported at Year 2017
